movie.title: Anthropocene
movie.description_intro: The world has ended due to wars, lack of food and resources. People have turned on each other in an effort to hoard whatever food is left. Some have turned to cannibalism. On top of that, a new, unknown virus is ravaging the planet. Clean, drinkable water has run out. Violence is running rampant through this new wasteland. Claire, a lone girl treks the new, dangerous wasteland in search of food and clean water. Clinging on to the last of her supplies, she has to fight hordes of killers after her at every turn.
movie.description_full: The world has ended due to wars, lack of food and resources. People have turned on each other in an effort to hoard whatever food is left. Some have turned to cannibalism. On top of that, a new, unknown virus is ravaging the planet. Clean, drinkable water has run out. Violence is running rampant through this new wasteland. Claire, a lone girl treks the new, dangerous wasteland in search of food and clean water. Clinging on to the last of her supplies, she has to fight hordes of killers after her at every turn.

movies.title: Undisputed
movies.summary: George "Ice Man" Chambers (Rhames) is a top ranked heavyweight boxer. However Chambers has his world turned upside down when he is accused of rape and sent to prison. Upon his arrival he hears talk about Monroe Hutchen (Snipes) who is the top ranked prison boxing champ 10 years running. Immediately there is bad blood with Chambers not wanting to be second to no one which leads to a lunch room fight between the men. Figuring it will be a good way to make money fellow convict Emmanuel 'Mendy' Ripstein (Peter Falk) sets up a prison boxing match between the two men to decide who is the real UNDISPUTED champ. Michael Rooker plays a guard, Fisher Stevens, John Seda, and Master P co star.

movies.title: The Riot and the Dance
movies.summary: Follow the journey of Dr. Gordon Wilson as he traverses the globe studying God's remarkable land animals.
movies.description_full: Follow the journey of Dr. Gordon Wilson as he traverses the globe studying God's remarkable land animals.

movies.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin IV: Eve of Destiny
movies.title_english: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin IV: Eve of Destiny
movies.title_long: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin IV: Eve of Destiny (2016)
movies.summary: Char saved Lalah on the Earth after he was expelled from military academy for the rebellion. Tem Ray goes to the Moon because he heard a news that Dr. Minovsky tries to defect from Zeon.
movies.description_full: Char saved Lalah on the Earth after he was expelled from military academy for the rebellion. Tem Ray goes to the Moon because he heard a news that Dr. Minovsky tries to defect from Zeon.

movies.title: Backgammon
movies.summary: When Lucian and Miranda are left alone in an isolated mansion for the weekend, their mutual attraction grows, as does their unease about the whereabouts of Miranda's ex-boyfriend who may be hiding somewhere in the house.
movies.description_full: When Lucian and Miranda are left alone in an isolated mansion for the weekend, their mutual attraction grows, as does their unease about the whereabouts of Miranda's ex-boyfriend who may be hiding somewhere in the house.
